sections.name: Starters
sections.description: Appetizing starters to begin your meal.

menu_items.name: Basted Wings
menu_items.description: Slow roasted chicken wings with honey and soy sauce.

menu_items.name: Grilled Potatoes with Spicy Sauce (A.K.A. Patatas Bravas)
menu_items.description: Baked potato wedges with Canarian style spicy sauce.

menu_items.name: Russian Salad with “Regañás”
menu_items.description: A traditional sweet potato recipe, which gives a small candy touch.

menu_items.name: Braised Ham & Cheddar Cheese Quesadilla
menu_items.description: Grilled wheat quesadilla with spicy mayo & pico de gallo.

menu_items.name: Prawn Gyozas with Sweet and Sour Vegetables (5 Units)
menu_items.description: Steamed Chinese pie based on sweet chilli and Korean soybean.

menu_items.name: Confit Leek Salad
menu_items.description: With tomato pesto, grapes and seeds.

sections.name: Main Dishes
sections.description: Hearty main courses to satisfy your hunger.

menu_items.name: Pulled Pork Tacos
menu_items.description: With pico de gallo & jalapeño.

menu_items.name: Onion & Beer Meatballs
menu_items.description: Mix of meats cooked in pepper, onions and the best local beer.

menu_items.name: Ricotta Ravioli
menu_items.description: With a soft cream of spinach & crispy caramel touch.

menu_items.name: “Minichopos” (2 Units)
menu_items.description: Breaded veal steaks stuffed with ham and cheese. Finished with Iberian veil.

menu_items.name: Salmon Tiradito
menu_items.description: With ají, passion fruit and pumpkin spaghetti.

sections.name: Dessert
sections.description: Sweet desserts to end your meal.

menu_items.name: Brownie with Vanilla Ice Cream
menu_items.description: Decadent chocolate brownie served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

menu_items.name: Cheesecake
menu_items.description: Classic cheesecake with a hint of vanilla.

sections.name: Drinks
sections.description: A wide selection of drinks to accompany your meal.

menu_items.name: Soft Drinks
menu_items.description: Coca-Cola, Sprite, Fanta, mineral water & sparkling water.

menu_items.name: Homemade Lemonade
menu_items.description: Freshly made lemonade.

menu_items.name: Juices
menu_items.description: Pineapple, peach or orange; Tomato.

menu_items.name: Beers
menu_items.description: A selection of draft and bottled beers.

menu_items.name: Cocktails
menu_items.description: Non-alcoholic Mojito, Mojito, Caipirinha, Caipiroska & Bloody Mary.

menu_items.name: Spirits
menu_items.description: Baileys, Martini Rosso & Bianco, Herbs liqueur, Patxarán.

sections.name: Wines
sections.description: A fine selection of reds and whites.

menu_items.name: Protos
menu_items.description: Ribera del Duero red wine.

menu_items.name: Carro Blanco
menu_items.description: Verdejo white wine.
